description: Digitally balanced numbers in base 3: equal numbers of 0's, 1's, 2's.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
prog: (Haskell)a049354 n = a049354_list !! (n-1)a049354_list = filter f [1..] where   f n = t0 == a062756 n && t0 == a081603 n where t0 = a077267 n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 09 2014
author: _Harvey P. Dale_
